title: Episode 237 w/ Conway The Machine & Tragedy Khadafi
itunes:title: Episode 237 w/ Conway The Machine & Tragedy Khadafi
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys chop it with Conway The Machine and Tragedy Khadafi! The guys discuss the global impact of Griselda, Tragedy’s song “Arrest The President”, CNN, working with NAS, having the support of HOV, and much more! 

We are also joined by special guest Pio Laditingancia!

Make some noise!!!

Follow Drink Champs:

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

 DJ EFN

http://www.crazyhood.com

http://www.instagram.com/whoscrazy

http://www.twitter.com/djefn

http://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions

 N.O.R.E.

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
